comment: I had a hybrid class with her and actually ended up enjoying it, most of the time. My first essay grade was low but that was honestly my fault for not following the directions. MAKE SURE YOU FOLLOW DIRECTIONS, that's all I'm saying. Everything you need to do is on D2L and she also answers emails or will even meet with you. I did learn a lot.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She is a great professor who genuinely cares about helping her students and you can tell she wants the best for you and your writing.

Mrs. Harkreader is one of the best professors I've ever had! She is personable, clear with her expectations, and reasonable with her assignments. You will improve as a writer if you take her class. I wish she taught more so I could take another class from her. 10/10 would recommend!

Professor Harkreader is a kind and compassionate woman who genuinely cares about her student's success. She gives clear and honest feedback on assignments and does have too many discussion posts. She offers extra credit for attending writing workshops and is understanding of any personal emergencies that affect the assignment deadlines.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I agree that Ms. Harkreader is a wonderful professor. She gives feedback quickly and posts grades fast, and if you email her she will always respond and answer your questions. You definitely have to work and sometimes it seems like a lot for a freshman class but the class is interesting and you will learn a lot. Very encouraging, interesting lady.

Ms. Harkreader is a wonderful teacher. In her class, you are allowed to chose what you would like to write about, something most teachers don't allow students to do. It made the class a lot more interesting. She was also always by our sides giving us individual feedback. Homework wasn't too demanding and she keeps deadlines very up to date!

Professor Harkreader is really good. She wants you to pass and cares that you learn what you should so you do a good job in the next one. She uses examples from the news and other realworld things, even memes she connects to the lesson. The class might be boring sometimes especially if you do not like writing but the teacher is recommended.

Very high quality English teacher. I took her hybrid class which was not easy but was reasonable. It was a lot of reading and writing about argument, and you can mostly choose what you write about. Make sure you show up, participate, and do all the work!

Professor Harkreader is a great teacher. She did a good job of explaining what we needed to do for assignments, and we had a lot of time to work with her individually to make sure we were doing the right thing. I personally learned a lot in her class which ended up being my favorite one this semester.
rating_tags: Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Would take again
